channel.title: Server help
channel.description: hi, im trying to make a 317 rsps (my first one) and i think ive done evreyhtign right dl java and winrar dled a source and client and i am pretty sure i did portfowarding right but whenver i try to run my client it either says error connecting to server (almost all the time) the port is already in use or server is already in use any suggestions??

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Wrong section

Port already in use; there is a program using the port 43594, such as music players (Limewire, frost wire, etc), torrents (uTorrent, BitTorrent etc), or it could be another program I havenâ€™t mentioned, try closing any programs running in the background (Except for your virus protection :P), then try it, or you can always try rebooting your computer.

Read full topic
